sample.GUI

Class FileTreeView

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.GUI.FileTreeView

  • public class FileTreeView
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class responsible for definition and management of Files structure representation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileTreeView

        public FileTreeView(javafx.scene.control.TreeView<java.io.File> tree,
                    javafx.scene.control.TextArea fileViewContainer)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor for FileTreeView class, sets SelectionModel e.g. "Display chosen file content" and CellFactory method used for constructing TreeItems, rows of the JavaFX TreeView element
        Parameters:
        tree - JavaFX's TreeView object which will represent Files structure
        fileViewContainer - JavaFX's TextArea element used as container to display file content
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown when could not create/read files
